commands.name: /finish_vn
commands.description: Mark a Visual Novel as finished and log your completion. This will award you points based on whether it's a current monthly VN or not.
commands.parameters:
• `title`: Search for a VN by title (type at least 2 characters to search VNDB)
• `comment`: Your review/thoughts (max 1000 characters)
• `rating`: Your rating from 1-5 (1=Terrible, 5=Masterpiece)

commands.name: /vn_leaderboard
commands.description: Display the leaderboard showing users ranked by their total points earned from reading Visual Novels. Optionally filter by specific month and/or server.
commands.parameters:
• `month`: Optional - Filter by specific month (e.g., '2025-09')
• `server`: Optional - Filter by specific server (autocomplete available)

commands.name: /vn_server_leaderboard
commands.description: Display server-specific leaderboards showing the top servers ranked by total points, with the top 5 contributors from each server.

commands.name: /profile
commands.description: View comprehensive user statistics including total points, VN completions, monthly entries, most active server, and recent activity chart. You can use a mention or user ID (works even for users not in the server).
commands.parameters: • `user`: Optional - The user whose profile you want to view (defaults to yourself)

commands.name: /logs
commands.description: View reading logs for yourself or another user. Shows all completed VNs, ratings, comments, and points earned. You can use a mention or user ID (works even for users not in the server).
commands.parameters: • `user`: Optional - The user whose logs you want to view (defaults to yourself)

commands.name: /ratings
commands.description: View ratings and comments for a specific VN from all users who have rated it.
commands.parameters: • `title`: Search for a VN by title (type at least 2 characters to search VNDB)

commands.name: /log_undo
commands.description: Delete one of your reading logs. You can only delete your own logs unless you have admin permissions.
commands.parameters: • `log_id`: The ID of the log to delete (autocomplete shows your logs)

commands.name: /log_edit
commands.description: Edit the comment or rating on one of your reading logs. You can only edit your own logs.
commands.parameters:
• `log_id`: The ID of the log to edit (autocomplete shows your logs)
• `comment`: Optional - New comment (max 1000 characters)
• `rating`: Optional - New rating from 1-5

commands.name: /vnpool
commands.description: Display all Visual Novels in the club's database. Current monthly VNs are shown first, followed by others sorted by start date.

commands.name: /get_current_monthly
commands.description: Show detailed information about the current month's featured Visual Novels, including points, descriptions, and VNDB links.
